name: Mars Times visitor interface
description: This is astudent project where we did a Newspaper. This is the interface for the visitor where he or she can read free articles, or sign up and buy a subscription to read premium articles.

name: Mars Times admin interface
description: This is a student project where we did a Newspaper. This is the admin interface where a journalist or editor can log in to write and publish articles.

name: Mars Times mobile interface
description: This is a student project where we did a Newspaper. This is the mobile application that is the visitors interface where he or she can read free articles and if they have a premium account, log in to read premium articles.

name: Mars Times API
description: This is a student project where we did a Newspaper. This is our own API that we built to store data, authenticate users, make external API calls and serialize the responses.

name: Rock, Paper, Scissors challenge
description: This was a is a student project where I developt a rock, paper, scissors game in React

name: Grog Bot
description: This is a student project where we created a web application where the user can choose an ingredient and then get a result of different cocktails that includes that ingredient, using the CocktailsDB API. We also used Systembolagets API to view the swedish produced alcohol available for the chosen drink

name: Grog Bot API
description: This is a student project where we created the API for our application Grog Bot. Here we stored data, serialized the reponses and made all external API calls.

name: Slow Food
description: This is a student project where we created a website where a user can log in to order food. It is displaying a menu and allows the user to make an order.

name: Slow Food API
description: This is a student project where we created the API for the Slow Food website. Here we are storing data, authenticating the users and handling the orders

name: The Cooper Test
description: This is a student project where we created a Cooper test calculator. The user can log in and enter their results and get a graph of previous results to view progress.

name: The Cooper Test API
description: This is a student project where we created the API for the Cooper Test. Here we are authenticating the user and storing the data.

name: Books API
description: This is a student project where we built a small API using Express NodeJs for the first time and testing with Mocha, Chai and Supertest.
